name: Soulja Boxing
description:
Soulja Boxing is a Simple & very challenging game.

- Tap left or right to Hit wood and avoid the branches.

Seems easy right? But after trying you will feel how tough and challenging this game is.

The longer you survive, the more you score. So, get ready for most addictive game ever.

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~
- iOS 10
- This game supports some famous game controllers!
- Better sound effects

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
